title: Push to Remove Fluoride from Water and Supplements Despite Decades of Safety Data
summary: HHS Secretary Kennedy called fluoride a 'dangerous neurotoxin' and pushed to remove it from drinking water and supplements, contradicting decades of scientific consensus on its safety and efficacy for dental health. FDA moved to phase out fluoride supplements for children's teeth. Utah became first state to ban fluoride in public drinking water. Kennedy announced task force to scrutinize fluoride use and ordered CDC to stop recommending it. Dental and public health experts warn removal threatens children's oral health, particularly in underserved communities.
